actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill relating to the dutiable status of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs).

summary.text: Removes import duties on fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs). (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill relating to the dutiable status of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat and fresh, chilled, or frozen meat of goats and sheep (except lambs).
